titulo: Icing in the context of sustainable aviation
descricao: Expected Outcome:The need to perform research in the field of icing, to ensuring safety and efficiency of proposed new solutions (TRL 3-5), is justified by the increasing incidence of weather hazards caused by climate change, the new generation of low carbon dioxide (CO2) aircraft with associated disruptive configurations, and the stringency of new policies and certification rules.In the mid-term, project results are expected to contribute to the following outcomes: Generating scientific experti
